# AI Ready PDX

> AI Ready PDX is a Portland-based AI consulting firm helping small to mid-sized businesses and nonprofits adopt AI safely and practically. Part of the Vital Enterprises family with 30+ years of technology leadership.

AI Ready PDX serves the Portland metro and Pacific Northwest region, offering practical AI solutions for organizations that want to use AI but don't need to become technology companies.

## Services

- [Strategy & Roadmaps](https://aireadypdx.com/#services): AI opportunity identification, 6-12 month roadmaps, ongoing strategy support
- [Automation & Agents](https://aireadypdx.com/#services): Internal tools, scheduling, intake forms, AI-assisted reporting
- [Marketing & Outreach](https://aireadypdx.com/#services): Website optimization, SEO/AEO/GEO, content calendars, ethical outreach
- [Training & Enablement](https://aireadypdx.com/#services): Executive briefings, staff AI 101, developer bootcamps
- [Confidential AI](https://aireadypdx.com/#confidential-ai): On-premise deployment, private cloud inference, air-gapped solutions

## Pricing

- [AI Readiness Session](https://aireadypdx.com/#pricing): $50 (90% off, limited time) - 60-90 minute consultation with AI Opportunities Snapshot
- [AI Training & Quick Wins](https://aireadypdx.com/#pricing): $1,500/quarter - Training, web presence review, one deliverable per quarter
- [AI Deep Dive](https://aireadypdx.com/#pricing): $2,500 one-time - 4 hours consultation, written roadmap, training session included
- [Execution & Projects](https://aireadypdx.com/#pricing): Custom pricing - Marketing services, custom AI solutions, on-premise deployment

## Industries Served

- Field Services (HVAC, Plumbing, Landscaping)
- Retail & Hospitality (Coffee, Restaurants, Shops)
- Professional (Dental, Legal, Accounting)
- Civic & Education (Schools, Churches, Public Safety)
- Manufacturing (Machinery, Fabrication, Assembly)
